name: Finding Grandpa
description:
Gandpa is lost, and you have to find him! 

Help your poor granddad make it out of busy downtown by finding him and clicking him with the mouse!  Each time you do, he'll probably just wander off again as the downtown gets busier and busier!  Busy shoppers, kids, teens with phones, business people, sale signs, and food trucks all block your way to finding grandpa!

See how many levels you can beat in "Finding Grandpa"!

Controls: use the mouse to find and click on grandpa!

Created as part of the Game Dev Unlocked Jam #2!

Version history: 

1.0 - Initial release

1.1 - Fixed a bug where you could still select grandpa after losing the game

UPDATE: Apparently selecting grandpa after losing bug is still present after level 1.  I'll upload a fix soon.
